titles.title: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 2825 Oak Lawn Avenue in Dallas, Texas, as the "William H. 'Bill' Nelson Post Office Building".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

bill.summary: 9/12/2012--Introduced. Designates the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 2825 Oak Lawn Avenue in Dallas, Texas, as the "William H. 'Bill' Nelson Post Office Building."
